name: word-auto-open-with-document
title: Auto-open a task pane with a document
shortDescription: Configure a document to automatically open your Office Add-in's task pane when the document is opened.
longDescription: Configure a document to automatically open your Office Add-in's task pane when the document opens.

thumbnails.alt: The sample's task pane with buttons to turn auto-open on and off.

references.name: Automatically open a task pane with a document
references.description: Your Office Add-in may need the task pane to automatically open in certain documents. This sample shows how to configure a document to start with the add-in's task pane open when the document is opened.
